title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to {server_name}!
description: Thanks for adding Ladbot to your server! Here's everything you need to know to get started.

fields.name: ğŸ® Getting Started
fields.value:
Use `l.help` to see all available commands!
Try `l.minesweeper beginner` for a fun game!

fields.name: âš™ï¸ Server Configuration
fields.value:
Admins can use `l.settings` to customize bot settings.
Enable/disable commands per server with `l.settings <command> on/off`

fields.name: ğŸ¯ Popular Commands
fields.value:
`l.minesweeper` - Interactive minesweeper game
`l.8ball <question>` - Magic 8-ball predictions
`l.weather <city>` - Weather information
`l.jokes` - Random jokes and puns
`l.crypto <coin>` - Cryptocurrency prices
`l.reddit <subreddit>` - Browse Reddit posts

fields.name: ğŸ”§ Admin Features
fields.value:
`l.autoresponse` - Set up automatic responses
`l.settings` - Manage server settings
`l.reload` - Reload bot components

fields.name: ğŸ“ Support & Feedback
fields.value:
Use `l.feedback <message>` to send feedback to developers!
Need help? Try `l.help <command>` for detailed command info.

footer.text: Enjoy using Ladbot! ğŸ‰ â€¢ Visit our GitHub for updates
